properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 2 at 2:13PM PST until March 4 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.


- GENERAL SEAS...5 to 7 ft today rising to 8 to 10 ft late
tonight before climbing into the 10 to 12 ft range Tuesday.

- FIRST EBB...Around 10 PM Mon. Seas to 10 ft.

- SECOND EBB...Around 1045 AM Tue. Seas to 13 ft.

- THIRD EBB...Around 1130 PM Tue. Seas to 13 ft.



* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...Small Craft Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to
midnight PST tonight. Small Craft Advisory, from 5 AM Tuesday
to 3 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft
especially when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 3 AM PST WEDNESDAY
